{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.20489v1", "title": "Sign Convention for $A_{\infty}$-Operations in Bott-Morse Case", "summary": "We describe the sign and orientation issue appearing the filtered
$A_{\infty}$-formulae in Lagrangian Floer theory using de Rham model in
Bott-Morse setting. After giving the definition of filtered
$A_{\infty}$-operations in a Fukaya category, we verify the filtered
$A_{\infty}$-formulae.", "main_category": "math.SG", "categories": "math.SG,math.DG", "published": "2025-04-29T07:27:22Z"}
